description: Largest least prime signature, A025487(k), dividing A025487(n), k < n.
comments: Note that A036041(A025487(n)) = A036041( a(n) ) + 1 since A025487(n) /a(n) is prime.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
prog: (Haskell)a051466 n = a051466_list !! (n-2)a051466_list = f [head a025487_list] $ tail a025487_list where   f us (v:vs) = fromJust (find (\x -> mod v x == 0) us) : f (v : us) vs-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 17 2013
author: _Alford Arnold_
